name: Shah Rukh Khan
summary:
Shah Rukh Khan, also known by the initials SRK, is an Indian actor, film producer, and television personality. He was born on November 2, 1965, in New Delhi, India.
 Khan began his acting career in the late 1980s and became a household name in the 1990s with his roles in successful films such as 'Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge' (1995) and 'Kuch Kuch Hota Hai' (1998). He has since appeared in numerous critically acclaimed and commercially successful films, including 'Devdas' (2002), 'Chak De! India' (2007), and 'My Name Is Khan' (2010).
 Aside from acting, Khan is also a successful film producer and has produced several films under his production company, Red Chillies Entertainment. He has also been a television host, including hosting the popular Indian version of the game show 'Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?' called 'Kaun Banega Crorepati' in 2007.
Khan is considered one of the most successful and influential actors in the Indian film industry. He has won numerous awards for his performances, including 14 Filmfare Awards, which is the most won by any actor in the history of the awards. In 2005, he was honored with the Padma Shri, which is one of the highest civilian awards in India

movies.title: Zero
movies.plot: Bauua Singh, a vertically challenged man, falls in love with a scientist with cerebral palsy and soon realizes that his purpose in life is to help her achieve her dreams.
awards: None
movies.description: Zero is a romantic drama film directed by Aanand L. Rai, starring Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma, and Katrina Kaif. The film tells the story of Bauua Singh, a vertically challenged man who falls in love with a scientist with cerebral palsy, played by Anushka Sharma. The movie explores themes of love, self-discovery, and the pursuit of dreams.
movies.controversy: Zero faced criticism for its portrayal of the character with cerebral palsy, with some viewers accusing the film of using the condition as a gimmick or for laughs. However, the film also received praise for its performances and its depiction of a love story that transcends societal norms.

movies.title: Jab Harry Met Sejal
movies.plot: Harry, a tour guide in Europe, falls in love with Sejal, one of his clients, who is searching for her lost engagement ring.
awards: None
movies.description: Jab Harry Met Sejal is a romantic comedy-drama directed by Imtiaz Ali, starring Shah Rukh Khan and Anushka Sharma. The film follows the story of Harry, a tour guide in Europe, who falls in love with Sejal, a woman searching for her lost engagement ring. The movie explores themes of love, self-discovery, and the importance of relationships.
movies.controversy: Jab Harry Met Sejal received mixed reviews from audiences and critics. Some criticized the film for its lackluster plot and character development, while others appreciated the chemistry between Shah Rukh Khan and Anushka Sharma. However, the movie did not generate any major controversies or scandals.

movies.title: Raees
movies.plot: Raees, a bootlegger in Gujarat, becomes a powerful figure in the state's liquor network. However, his life takes a turn when he becomes a target of a police officer.
awards: Filmfare Award for Best Actor (Critics) - Shah Rukh Khan
Zee Cine Award for Best Actor – Male - Shah Rukh Khan
movies.description: Raees is a crime drama directed by Rahul Dholakia, starring Shah Rukh Khan, Mahira Khan, and Nawazuddin Siddiqui. The film is set in Gujarat and tells the story of Raees, a bootlegger who becomes a powerful figure in the state's liquor network. The movie explores themes of power, corruption, and morality.
movies.controversy: Raees faced controversy during its release due to its depiction of Muslims and the Gujarati community. Some political groups in Gujarat protested against the movie's release, citing concerns about its impact on communal harmony. However, the film went on to become a commercial success and was praised for its performances, particularly Shah Rukh Khan's portrayal of Raees.

movies.title: Dear Zindagi
movies.plot: Kaira, a budding cinematographer in search of the perfect life, meets Dr. Jehangir, a free-spirited psychologist who helps her gain a new perspective on her own life.
awards: Filmfare Award for Best Actress - Alia Bhatt
Zee Cine Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role - Male - Shah Rukh Khan
movies.description: Dear Zindagi is a drama directed by Gauri Shinde, starring Alia Bhatt and Shah Rukh Khan. The film explores the story of Kaira, a young woman in search of the perfect life, who meets Dr. Jehangir, a psychologist who helps her gain a new perspective on her own life. The movie explores themes of love, life, and self-discovery.

movies.title: Fan
movies.plot: Gaurav, a die-hard fan of superstar Aryan Khanna, embarks on a dangerous mission to meet his idol and prove his love and loyalty towards him.
movies.description: Fan is a drama thriller directed by Maneesh Sharma, starring Shah Rukh Khan as both the protagonist and antagonist. The film tells the story of Gaurav, a die-hard fan of superstar Aryan Khanna, who embarks on a dangerous mission to meet his idol and prove his love and loyalty towards him. The movie explores themes of obsession, celebrity culture, and the dangers of fandom.
movies.controversy: The film sparked controversy when it was alleged that portions of it were copied from the 1996 Hollywood film 'The Fan'.

movies.title: Dilwale
movies.plot: The siblings of two estranged lovers fall for each other, unaware of the violent past that drove their respective siblings apart.
movies.description: Dilwale is an action comedy drama directed by Rohit Shetty and starring Shah Rukh Khan, Kajol, Varun Dhawan, and Kriti Sanon. The film follows the story of two estranged lovers whose siblings fall in love with each other, but are unaware of the violent past that drove their respective siblings apart. Despite mixed reviews, the movie was a commercial success at the box office.

movies.title: Happy New Year
movies.plot: A team of losers win the love of millions in their quest to pull off the biggest diamond heist ever.
movies.description: Happy New Year is an action comedy drama directed by Farah Khan and starring Shah Rukh Khan, Deepika Padukone, and Abhishek Bachchan. The film follows a group of underdogs who set out to pull off the biggest diamond heist ever, while also competing in a dance competition. Despite mixed reviews, the movie was a commercial success at the box office.

movies.title: Chennai Express
movies.plot: A man's trip to fulfill his late grandfather's last wish turns into an unexpected adventure when he meets a unique young woman from southern India.
movies.description: Chennai Express is an action comedy romance directed by Rohit Shetty and starring Shah Rukh Khan and Deepika Padukone. The film follows the story of a man who embarks on a journey to fulfill his late grandfather's last wish, but ends up on an unexpected adventure when he meets a unique young woman from southern India. The movie was a commercial success and one of the highest-grossing Bollywood films of all time.

movies.title: Jab Tak Hai Jaan
movies.plot: An ex-army man, leading a double life in London, must choose between his wife and muse.
awards: National Film Award for Best Background Score
IIFA Award for Best Cinematography
Filmfare Award for Best Choreography
and more
movies.description: Jab Tak Hai Jaan is a romantic drama film directed by Yash Chopra and starring Shah Rukh Khan, Katrina Kaif, and Anushka Sharma. The movie follows the story of an ex-army man living a double life in London, who must choose between his wife and muse. The film received mixed reviews but was a commercial success at the box office.

movies.title: Don 2
movies.plot: Don, a wanted criminal, dies in a police chase. DSP D'Silva is the only one who knows about his death, and to get hold of the gang he trains a lookalike, Vijay. However, Vijay faces danger when Don's associates learn of his existence.
awards: Filmfare Award for Best Sound Design
Zee Cine Award for Best Sound Design
Stardust Award for Best Action
and more
movies.description: Don 2 is an action thriller film directed by Farhan Akhtar and starring Shah Rukh Khan, Priyanka Chopra, Boman Irani, Lara Dutta, and Kunal Kapoor. The movie follows the story of Don, a wanted criminal who dies in a police chase. DSP D'Silva is the only one who knows about his death, and to get hold of the gang, he trains a lookalike, Vijay. However, Vijay faces danger when Don's associates learn of his existence. The film was a commercial success and received positive reviews from critics.

movies.title: Ra.One
movies.plot: When Ra.One, a virtual reality character, learns about his true identity, he decides to seek revenge against his creator, Shekhar. He teams up with Shekhar's wife to destroy Ra.One and save their son's life.
awards: Filmfare Award for Best Visual Effects
National Film Award for Best Special Effects
Stardust Award for Best Action
and more
movies.description: Ra.One is an action sci-fi film directed by Anubhav Sinha and starring Shah Rukh Khan, Kareena Kapoor, Arjun Rampal, and Shahana Goswami. The movie follows the story of Ra.One, a virtual reality character who learns about his true identity and seeks revenge against his creator, Shekhar. He teams up with Shekhar's wife to destroy Ra.One and save their son's life. The film received mixed reviews from critics but was a commercial success at the box office.

movies.title: Dulha Mil Gaya
movies.plot: When a struggling actor gets the chance to marry a wealthy heiress, he jumps at the opportunity. But things become complicated when he falls in love with someone else.
awards: Nominated, Stardust Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role – Female (Sushmita Sen)
Nominated, Stardust Award for Superstar of Tomorrow – Male (Fardeen Khan)
movies.description: Dulha Mil Gaya is a romantic comedy film directed by Mudassar Aziz and starring Shah Rukh Khan, Sushmita Sen, Fardeen Khan, and Ishita Sharma. The movie follows the story of a struggling actor who gets the chance to marry a wealthy heiress and improve his financial situation, but he ends up falling in love with someone else. The film received negative reviews from critics and was a box office failure.

movies.title: My Name Is Khan
movies.plot: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.
awards: Best Director - Popular
Best Actor - Popular

movies.title: Luck By Chance
movies.plot: A struggling actor comes from Delhi to Bombay and enters the Hindi film industry. This gives the audience an in sight into what sometimes happens when making a movie and what happens in the industry.
awards: Best Debutant Director - Zoya Akhtar

movies.title: Billu
movies.plot: A man's simple lie to secure his job escalates into more complex lies when his celebrity childhood friend comes to town.
awards: Nominated, Filmfare Award for Best Supporting Actress – Lara Dutta
movies.description:
Billu is a heartwarming Bollywood comedy-drama film directed by Priyadarshan. The movie revolves around a man named Billu, played by Irrfan Khan, who lives in a small village in India. His life takes a turn when his childhood friend, a famous Bollywood superstar, comes to his village for a film shoot. Billu lies to the villagers that he and the superstar are childhood friends, which leads to a series of misunderstandings and complications.

The film features an impressive cast including Irrfan Khan, Lara Dutta, and Om Puri. The music of the film was composed by Pritam and the lyrics were penned by Gulzar. The film was praised for its performances and music, and was a commercial success at the box office.

Overall, Billu is a heartwarming tale of friendship, love, and loyalty that will leave you feeling warm and fuzzy inside.

movies.title: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi
movies.plot: A middle-aged man who lost his love for life rediscovers it by assuming a new identity in order to rekindle the romantic spark in his marriage.
awards: Filmfare Award for Best Actor - Shah Rukh Khan
Filmfare Award for Best Supporting Actress - Anushka Sharma
movies.description: Rab Ne Bana Di Jodi is a 2008 Indian romantic comedy-drama film directed by Aditya Chopra and produced by Yash Raj Films. The film stars Shah Rukh Khan and Anushka Sharma in the lead roles. The story follows a middle-aged man named Surinder Sahni who falls in love with his young, vivacious neighbor Taani. However, he realizes that she is already engaged to be married to someone else. To win her heart, Surinder undergoes a drastic transformation and takes on a new identity as a flamboyant and charming man named Raj. As Raj, he helps Taani prepare for her dance competition and eventually wins her heart. The film explores themes of love, identity, and self-discovery.

movies.title: Bhoothnath
movies.plot: Moving into a new house, a family witnesses an unfriendly ghost who wants to drive them away from the house. However, he befriends a little boy who changes his outlook forever.
awards: Nominated, Screen Award for Best Actor in a Supporting Role, Amitabh Bachchan
Nominated, Screen Award for Best Actress in a Supporting Role, Juhi Chawla
movies.description: Bhoothnath is a 2008 Indian Hindi-language comedy-drama film directed by Vivek Sharma, and starring Amitabh Bachchan, Juhi Chawla, and Satish Shah. The film is about a friendly ghost who has to scare off a family to get a place to haunt, but befriends the young son of the family instead, who teaches him to be brave. Bhoothnath is a heartwarming tale of friendship and courage.

name: salman khan
summary:
Salman Khan made his acting debut in 1988 with the film Biwi Ho To Aisi, but he gained fame with his lead role in the 1989 film Maine Pyar Kiya. He has acted in over 80 Hindi films in his career, including blockbuster hits such as Hum Aapke Hain Koun..!, Karan Arjun, Bajrangi Bhaijaan, Dabangg, and Sultan, among others.
Besides acting, Salman Khan is also a successful producer and has produced films like Chillar Party, Hero, and Race 3, among others. He is also known for his philanthropic work and has founded the Being Human Foundation, which works for the betterment of underprivileged children and healthcare.
Salman Khan has been involved in several controversies throughout his career, including his alleged involvement in a hit-and-run case in 2002, which he was acquitted of in 2015. Despite the controversies, Salman Khan remains one of the most popular and successful actors in Bollywood.

movies.title: Maine Pyar Kiya
movies.plot: The story revolves around a young man named Prem who falls in love with Suman. The two must overcome their families' objections to their relationship and prove their love for each other.
awards: Filmfare Award for Best Film
Filmfare Award for Best Director
Filmfare Award for Best Male Debut (Salman Khan)
National Film Award for Best Popular Film Providing Wholesome Entertainment

movies.title: Baaghi: A Rebel for Love
movies.plot: The film follows the story of a young man named Saajan who falls in love with a girl named Kajal, but their relationship is met with opposition from her father and his criminal associates.

movies.title: Dancer
movies.plot: The film tells the story of a young woman who dreams of becoming a successful dancer, but her aspirations are threatened by her family's opposition and her love for a man who disapproves of her profession.

movies.title: Saajan
movies.plot: The film tells the story of two friends, Aman and Akash, who fall in love with the same woman, Pooja. Aman sacrifices his love for Akash, but when Akash is injured, Pooja takes care of him, leading to a series of misunderstandings.
awards: Filmfare Award for Best Supporting Actor (Sanjay Dutt)
Filmfare Award for Best Lyricist (Sameer)
Filmfare Award for Best Music Director (Nadeem-Shravan)

movies.title: Kurbaan
movies.plot: The film follows the story of a young man named Akash who seeks revenge against a gang of criminals who killed his family.

movies.title: Love
movies.plot: The film tells the story of a wealthy man who falls in love with a woman from a lower socioeconomic background. Their relationship is met with opposition from their families.

name: Deepika Padukone
summary:
Deepika Padukone is an Indian actress and producer who primarily works in Hindi films. She was born on January 5, 1986 in Copenhagen, Denmark, and raised in Bangalore, India.
Deepika made her acting debut in 2006 with the Kannada film 'Aishwarya'. She then made her Bollywood debut in 2007 with the film 'Om Shanti Om', which was a huge commercial success and earned her the Filmfare Award for Best Female Debut.
Since then, Deepika has starred in numerous successful Bollywood films including 'Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani', 'Chennai Express', 'Bajirao Mastani', 'Padmaavat', and 'Chhapaak'. She has won several awards for her performances including three Filmfare Awards.
Apart from acting, Deepika is also involved in various social causes and philanthropy work. She has also been named as one of the 100 most influential people in the world by Time magazine.

name: Priyanka chopra
summary:
Priyanka Chopra is an Indian actress, singer, film producer, and former Miss World. She was born on July 18, 1982 in Jamshedpur, India.
Priyanka made her acting debut in 2002 with the Tamil film 'Thamizhan'. She then went on to star in several Bollywood films such as 'Andaaz', 'Aitraaz', 'Fashion', 'Barfi!', 'Mary Kom', and 'Bajirao Mastani'. She has won several awards for her performances including the National Film Award for Best Actress.
In addition to her acting career, Priyanka has also released several hit singles and is known for her philanthropy work. She is a UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador and has been involved in several humanitarian causes including education, health, and gender equality.
Priyanka is also recognized for her work in Hollywood. She made her Hollywood debut in the TV series 'Quantico' and has also starred in films such as 'Baywatch', 'A Kid Like Jake', and 'Isn't It Romantic'.
